item.description:
Welcome to the Monday Happy Meetup series!

This event is open to all, especially those who hate Mondays and for those who want to check out the different restaurant and bar scenes in Providence.

This week's location is: DownCity on Weybosset Street in Providence

DownCity has been a Providence culinary institution for a long time and changed a lot over the years. Most recently, (they were ASKED t o participate, I might add) it has been featured in the Food Network's Kitchen Nightmares. The Collective has been to DownCity several times and honestly, in my humble opinion, I always liked and enjoyed the food as it was. And yes, I LIKED the meatloaf......Truthfully, and again in my humble opinion of course, I'm not sure that Gordan's adjustments to the menu have been so wonderful. BUT - you be the judge! Let's check out the changes and one thing I'm sure hasn't changed is that the drinks are still great! DownCity has a trendy and hip decor with a tasty and diverse menu (prior to Chef Ramsey), but while we're there make the comparison for yourself if you've been before...... DownCity is a favorite of many Collective members and its been over a year since we've been, so let's check it out!

Hope to see you there!

Come early, come late, leave early, stay late, everyone is always welcome...

Nothing ever cancels Monday Happy Hours.
Ever.
item.how_to_find_us: I'll be wearing a silver scarf, but we're hard to miss!
item.name: Monday Night Meetup - DownCity
